span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 同时代的，同龄的：of the same or equal age, antiquity, or duration
【例】Two stars thought to be coeval because they have nearly the same mass and brightness. 两个星星同龄因为他们的质量和亮度几乎相同。
【近】coetaneous[,kəʊɪ'teɪnɪəs], coexisting, concurrent, contemporaneous, simultaneous[,saɪml'tenɪəs], synchronic, synchronous
【反】asynchronous, noncontemporary, nonsimultaneous 不同时的
【记】 co + eval
